name: Animal Crossing Custom Designs
description:
Create your scaleable custom designs from Animal Crossing in Figma!!

1. Create your design 
2. Export the design as image
3. Upload the design to acpatterns.com
4. Convert the design to QR code 
5. Open the Nintendo Online app on your smartphone 
6. Scan the QR code to import the design in-game. 

Shiba pixel art credits: https://dribbble.com/shots/6508914-Shiba-Inu-loves-you
